controllers

Class ApplicationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller
      • controllers.ApplicationController

  • public class ApplicationController
extends Controller
    Implements controller that handles requests for searching tweets according to keywords and displaying Tweeter's user profiles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ApplicationController(UserProfileService userProfileService, TenTweetsForKeywordService tenTweetsForKeywordService, FormFactory formFactory, HttpExecutionContext ec)
      Creates a new application controller

      Handles tweet search based on keywords.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Result> userProfile(java.lang.String userProfileId)

    • Method Detail

      • index

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Result> index()
        Renders home page
        Returns:
        promise of a result with a rendered home page.

      • search

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Result> search()
        Handles tweet search based on keywords. Retrieves a search phrase from a UI form. Then, if the phrase is not empty, updates the list of searches with this new phrase and calls tweet search service with the full history of previous and current search phrases. Then renders a view with the result of all search phrases.
        Returns:
        promise of a result with a rendered view of tweet searches.

      • userProfile

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Result> userProfile(java.lang.String userProfileId)
        Retrieves user profile info and user's last 10 tweets and renders a view with this info.
        Parameters:
        userProfileId - Twitter account ID
        Returns:
        promise of a result with a rendered view of user profile info
